revised_title: Magneto-Hydrodynamic Boundary Layer in Two-Dimensional Steady Flow
tldr: The article investigates the magneto-hydrodynamic boundary layer in the two-dimensional steady flow past a semi-infinite flat plate under uniform conditions at infinity. The authors analyze the problem using the method of iteration and boundary layer equations, considering the effects of magnetic field and fluid dynamics. The study provides insights into the behavior of the flow and drag coefficient under varying magnetic and fluid conditions.
